statements: SELECT tree_species FROM Trees;
SELECT tree_species, planting_date FROM Trees WHERE tree_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Trees WHERE farmer_id = 100 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT tree_species, farmer_id FROM Trees WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT tree_species, planting_date FROM Trees WHERE tree_species LIKE 'Oak%';
SELECT * FROM Trees ORDER BY tree_species DESC, planting_date ASC, tree_id;
SELECT tree_species, COUNT(*) AS total_trees FROM Trees GROUP BY tree_species HAVING total_trees > 1 ORDER BY total_trees DESC;
SELECT tree_species, MAX(planting_date) AS latest_planting_date FROM Trees GROUP BY tree_species ORDER BY latest_planting_date DESC;
SELECT farmer_id, AVG(tree_id) AS average_tree_id FROM Trees GROUP BY farmer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_tree_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Trees WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY tree_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Farmer;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmer;
SELECT farmer_name, tree_species FROM Farmer, PlantingActivity WHERE Farmer.farmer_id = PlantingActivity.farmer_id;
SELECT farmer_name FROM Farmer ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, planting_date FROM Farmer, PlantingActivity WHERE Farmer.farmer_id = PlantingActivity.farmer_id AND status='active';
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmer WHERE farmer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PlantingActivity WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, tree_species, planting_date FROM Farmer JOIN PlantingActivity ON Farmer.farmer_id = PlantingActivity.farmer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT farm_location FROM Farmer WHERE farmer_name LIKE '%son%';

SELECT farmer_name, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM Farmer LEFT JOIN PlantingActivity ON Farmer.farmer_id = PlantingActivity.farmer_id GROUP BY farmer_name HAVING total_activities > 2 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT id, species, height FROM trees WHERE height > 10 ORDER BY species ASC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE status='active' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT name, address, contact_number FROM farmers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT id, species, planting_date FROM trees WHERE species='Oak' ORDER BY planting_date
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE status='completed'
SELECT * FROM trees WHERE height > 10 ORDER BY species ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT species, planting_date FROM trees WHERE location = 'Park' ORDER BY planting_date DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, name, contact_number FROM farmers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM trees t JOIN farmers f ON t.species = f.name WHERE t.height >= 5 ORDER BY t.height DESC
SELECT * FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM farmers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT farmer_name, email FROM farmers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM trees WHERE tree_type = 'Apple' AND height > 10;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, location, email FROM farmers;
SELECT tree_type, planting_date, height FROM trees WHERE height > 10 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01' AND start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT farmer_name, tree_type, planting_date, height FROM farmers INNER JOIN trees ON farmers.farmer_id = trees.farmer_id WHERE farmer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects LEFT JOIN project_trees ON projects.project_id = project_trees.project_id WHERE tree_id IS NULL ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_size FROM Farmers ORDER BY farm_size DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM AgroforestryProjects WHERE project_start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers WHERE farm_size > 10;
SELECT activity_description, activity_date, activity_location FROM PlantingActivities ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location, farm_size FROM Farmers;
SELECT * FROM Trees WHERE tree_height > 10 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM AgroforestryProjects WHERE project_location = 'California';
SELECT activity_description, activity_date, activity_location FROM PlantingActivities WHERE tree_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT farmer_name, tree_species, project_name FROM Farmers JOIN Trees ON Farmers.farmer_id = Trees.farmer_id JOIN AgroforestryProjects ON Trees.farmer_id = AgroforestryProjects.project_id;
